channel.title: Applying for SRL Member Status *READ*
channel.description:
[center][size=15pt][b]Applying for SRL Member Status Information[/b][/size][/center]
Please state(This is the format that you [b]must [/b]use to apply):
[ul][*] Why you will be benificial to us as an SRL Member. [*] Scripts that you have made. [*] Other scripting languages you know (If any). [*] Example of a script you have made please.[/ul]
None of this kind: "im a good person and trusted so let me in" or "i want free scripts please."
[b]Even if you were a member at SRL, you must re-apply!
Topics of people who applied will be moved only if they are accepted.[/b]
*[u]Please follow this format or you are [b][size=16pt]*NOT*[/size][/b] going to be accepted.[/u]*
*Note* [b]If your not accepted please do not PM Bebemycat2 or Starbalster100, reapply following the format and following the directions above.[/b]
Star & Bebe

item.title: Applying for SRL Member Status *READ*
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:12, topic:5202”][quote author=Cheesehunk link=topic=6816.msg72389#msg72389 date=1153276880]
SRL was made, and Fakawi did not want it to be leacher friendly, you must learn some SCAR to be able to use it.

People who say they can test it, most of them just take the script, and run it. Never giving a progress report, or saying thanks. They just leech it. If you know SCAR, you should be able to test it correctly and give the user well written Bug Reports. That is why we require you show a script, so everyone knows that you know SCAR.

Seriously, how hard can it be to make a simple SRL script? If you can’t be arsed to, IMHO, you don’t deserve to be in. =
[/quote]Exactly.

SRL requires SCAR know-how to use, if you can’t demonstrate knowledge then you don’t need accsess. I’m sorry but SRL is not supposed to be Leecher friendly ;)[/quote]

To bad some other things can not be leecher friendly.

Read full topic

item.title: Applying for SRL Member Status *READ*
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

[quote=“pat-s, post:13, topic:5202”][quote author=KyleGut3 link=topic=6816.msg70062#msg70062 date=1153174753]
I was a member over at SRL, but I didnt have to re-apply [unless there is more than the scripts that you need to apply access to], is there a reason for that?

Other than I am just way cool?
[/quote]

lol did anyone else notice that?

I do have a legitimate reason for posting as well…
How advanced of scripts are you looking for? And like Ron asked, if we are denied, can we go and try to make more advanced scripts, and reaply?[/quote]
Yes I noticed that, and I saw bebemycat2 saying to someone else that after they learn some scar scripting, they may reapply and they aren’t looking for advanced scripts… I think. Cause I just showed my simple auto typer. Like bebe said, you need to have some knowledge of scar. Just shoot me down if I’m wrong lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Applying for SRL Member Status *READ*
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[quote=“Cheesehunk, post:11, topic:5202”]SRL was made, and Fakawi did not want it to be leacher friendly, you must learn some SCAR to be able to use it.

People who say they can test it, most of them just take the script, and run it. Never giving a progress report, or saying thanks. They just leech it. If you know SCAR, you should be able to test it correctly and give the user well written Bug Reports. That is why we require you show a script, so everyone knows that you know SCAR.

Seriously, how hard can it be to make a simple SRL script? If you can’t be arsed to, IMHO, you don’t deserve to be in. =[/quote]Exactly.

SRL requires SCAR know-how to use, if you can’t demonstrate knowledge then you don’t need accsess. I’m sorry but SRL is not meant to be Leecher friendly
